snippet: Mr. Batiste was a fixture on the New Orleans music scene known as Uncle Lionel Batiste, and was also the face of the Treme neighborhood’s bicentennial.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Batiste was a fixture on the New Orleans music scene known as Uncle Lionel Batiste, and was also the face of the Treme neighborhood’s bicentennial.

headline.seo: Lionel Batiste Dies at 81; Drummer in Treme Brass Band
headline.main: Lionel Batiste, Brass Band Drummer, Dies at 81
